languages.text: "В его словах есть истина. Незачем идти на сделку с мертвецом". {n}Пальцы Кибеллы почти нежно скользят по лезвию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] "В его словах есть нить истины, Домин. Вам незачем идти на сделку с мертвецом". {n}Почти нежно скользит пальцами по лезвию Кибелла.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В его словах есть истина. Незачем идти на сделку с мертвецом". {n}Пальцы Кибеллы почти нежно скользят по лезвию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "There is truth in his words: there is no reason to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade in a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

languages.text: "Es liegt Wahrheit in seinen Worten: Verhandlungen mit Todgeweihten sind sinnlos." {n}Kibellah lässt ihre Finger langsam und fast zärtlich über ihre Klinge gleiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es liegt Wahrheit in seinen Worten: Verhandlungen mit Todgeweihten sind sinnlos." {n}Kibellah lässt ihre Finger langsam und fast zärtlich über ihre Klinge gleiten.{/n}

languages.text: « Il y a un fond de vérité dans ses paroles. Il est inutile de négocier avec un futur cadavre. » {n}Kibella caresse du bout des doigts le tranchant de sa lame.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il y a un fond de vérité dans ses paroles. Il est inutile de négocier avec un futur cadavre. » {n}Kibella caresse du bout des doigts le tranchant de sa lame.{/n}

languages.text: “他的话很有道理，与马上就要死了的人谈判，确实毫无意义。”{n}绮贝菈手指慢慢滑过刀刃边缘，像是爱抚一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他的话很有道理，与马上就要死了的人谈判，确实毫无意义。”{n}绮贝菈手指慢慢滑过刀刃边缘，像是爱抚一般。{/n}

languages.text: «Hay verdad en sus palabras: es absurdo negociar con un futuro cadáver». {n}Kibellah pasa sus dedos por el filo de su espada en un movimiento lento, casi una caricia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hay verdad en sus palabras: es absurdo negociar con un futuro cadáver». {n}Kibellah pasa sus dedos por el filo de su espada en un movimiento lento, casi una caricia.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼の言葉には一理あります。死ぬ運命にある者と交渉するのは無意味です」{n}キベラは刃の縁を、ゆっくりと、まるで愛撫するかのように指でなぞった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is truth in his words: it is senseless to negotiate with a corpse-to-be." {n}Kibellah runs her fingers along the edge of her blade with a slow, almost caressing motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼の言葉には一理あります。死ぬ運命にある者と交渉するのは無意味です」{n}キベラは刃の縁を、ゆっくりと、まるで愛撫するかのように指でなぞった。{/n}

languages.text: Haklısın. Ceset olacak biriyle müzakere etmek anlamsız." {n}Kibellah, neredeyse okşar gibi yavaş bir hareketle parmaklarını bıçağının kenarında gezdiriyor.{/n}
